manifest_desc.message: Adult Blocker (Parental Control) blocks access to porn sites (adult content, pornography).

actionPopup_js_log1.message: Does not contain any banned information

blockPage_text2.message: Adult Blocker closed access to the page because the page has a forbidden content.

blockPage_text3.message: In Adult Blocker has a function «black» and «white» lists to online resources when making sites in data sets, access is blocked or permitted regardless of other filter settings. If you think that your child is still too early to sit in a certain social networks or go to some specific sites - you can add them to the blacklist. White list - reverse tool that allows you to view sites that fell under the content filter (were locked plugin). To change the 'black' and 'white' lists, press in the upper left corner.

blockPage_text4.message: To view the site, add it to the exception.

optionsPage_text1.message:
Adult Blocker (Parental Control) - this limit the access of children and adolescents to undesirable sites on the Internet, for example, porn sites (adult content), sites where there is a promotion of violence.

The advantage of the plugin is that Adult Blocker provides an insightful analysis of the content and filter the page to load content, allowing you to block profanity, thereby providing better protection for your children. The product performs morphological analysis of web pages for the presence of «bad» words and phrases.

In Adult Blocker has a function «black» and «white» lists to online resources when making sites in data sets, access to them is blocked or allowed, regardless of other filtering settings. If you think that your child is still too early to sit in a certain social networks or go to some specific sites - you can add them to the blacklist. White list - reverse tool that allows you to view sites that fell under the content filter (were locked plugin).

optionsPage_js_text2.message: Incorrect password or passwords do not match

passwordPage_text1.message: Set password protection. Password protection does not allow a child to bypass access restrictions.
